verses.verse: And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G5055>finished<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3056>words,<s%> He <S%G3332>departed<s%> from <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> into the <S%G3725>region<s%> of <S%G2453>Judea<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan;<s%>
and <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> Him, and He <S%G2323>healed<s%> them <S%G1563>there.<s%>

And [some] <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to Him, <S%G3985>testing<s%> Him, and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> [for a man] to <S%G630>divorce<s%> his <S%G1135>wife<s%> for <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G156>cause<s%> at <S%G3956>all<s%>?"

And He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Have you not <S%G314>read,<s%> that He who <S%G2936>created<s%> [them] from the <S%G746>beginning<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> them <S%G7021>male<s%> and <S%G2338>female,<s%>

and <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1752>cause<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> shall <S%G2641>leave<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> and <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and shall <S%G2853>cleave<s%> to his <S%G1135>wife;<s%> and the <S%G1417>two<s%> shall <S%G1510>become<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%>'?

<S%G5620>"Consequently<s%> they are <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> <S%G1417>two,<s%> but <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%> <S%G3739>What<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G4801>joined<s%> <S%G4801>together,<s%> let <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5563>separate<s%>."

They <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> did <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1781>command<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> her a <S%G975>certificate<s%> of <S%G647>divorce<s%> and <S%G630>send<s%> [her] <S%G630>away<s%>?"

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4314>"Because<s%> of your <S%G4641>hardness<s%> of <S%G4641>heart,<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G2010>permitted<s%> you to <S%G630>divorce<s%> your <S%G1135>wives;<s%> but from the <S%G746>beginning<s%> it has not <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>way.<s%>

"And I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G630>divorces<s%> his <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G3361>except<s%> for <S%G4202>immorality,<s%> and <S%G1060>marries<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G243>woman<s%> <S%G3429>commits<s%> <S%G3429>adultery.<s%>"

The <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1487>"If<s%> the <S%G156>relationship<s%> of the <S%G444>man<s%> with his <S%G1135>wife<s%> is <S%G3779>like<s%> <S%G3779>this,<s%> it is <S%G4851>better<s%> not to <S%G1060>marry.<s%>"

But He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Not <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>men<s%> [can] <S%G5562>accept<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>statement,<s%> but [only] those to <S%G3739>whom<s%> it has been <S%G1325>given.<s%>

"For there are <S%G2135>eunuchs<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> were <S%G1080>born<s%> that <S%G3779>way<s%> from their mother's <S%G2836>womb;<s%> and there are <S%G2135>eunuchs<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> were <S%G2134>made<s%> <S%G2134>eunuchs<s%> by <S%G444>men;<s%> and there are [also] <S%G2135>eunuchs<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G2134>made<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G2134>eunuchs<s%> for the <S%G1223>sake<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven.<s%> He who is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G5562>accept<s%> [this,] let him <S%G5562>accept<s%> [it."]

<S%G5119>Then<s%> [some] <S%G3813>children<s%> were <S%G4374>brought<s%> to Him <S%G2443>so<s%> that He might <S%G2007>lay<s%> His <S%G5495>hands<s%> on them and <S%G4336>pray;<s%> and the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> them.

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G863>"Let<s%> the <S%G3813>children<s%> <S%G863>alone,<s%> and do not <S%G2967>hinder<s%> them from <S%G2064>coming<s%> to Me; for the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1510>belongs<s%> to <S%G5108>such<s%> as <S%G5108>these.<s%>"
And after <S%G2007>laying<s%> His <S%G5495>hands<s%> on them, He <S%G4198>departed<s%> from <S%G1564>there.<s%>

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to Him and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G18>thing<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do<s%> that I may <S%G2192>obtain<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>?"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> are you <S%G2065>asking<s%> Me <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> is <S%G18>good<s%>? There is [only] <S%G1520>One<s%> who is <S%G18>good;<s%> but <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G2309>wish<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> into <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G1785>commandments.<s%>"

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G4169>"Which<s%> <S%G4169>ones<s%>?" And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5346>said,<s%> "You shall not <S%G5407>commit<s%> <S%G5407>murder;<s%> You shall not <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery;<s%> You shall not <S%G2813>steal;<s%> You shall not <S%G5576>bear<s%> <S%G5576>false<s%> <S%G5576>witness;<s%>
<S%G5091>Honor<s%> your <S%G3962>father<s%> and <S%G3384>mother;<s%> and You shall <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> as <S%G4572>yourself.<s%> "

The <S%G3495>young<s%> <S%G3495>man<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G3956>"All<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> I have <S%G5442>kept;<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5302>am<s%> I <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G5302>lacking<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to him, <S%G1487>"If<s%> you <S%G2309>wish<s%> to be <S%G5046>complete,<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> [and] <S%G4453>sell<s%> your <S%G5225>possessions<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> to [the] <S%G4434>poor,<s%> and you shall <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> and <S%G1204>come,<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> Me."

But when the <S%G3495>young<s%> <S%G3495>man<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>statement,<s%> he <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G3076>grieved;<s%> for he was one who <S%G2192>owned<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2933>property.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, it is <S%G1423>hard<s%> for a <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G4145>man<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

" And <S%G3825>again<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, it is <S%G2123>easier<s%> for a <S%G2574>camel<s%> to go <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G5144>eye<s%> of a <S%G4476>needle,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for a <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G4145>man<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

And when the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> [this,] they were <S%G4970>very<s%> <S%G1605>astonished<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G686>"Then<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> be <S%G4982>saved<s%>?"

And <S%G1689>looking<s%> upon [them] <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "With <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> is <S%G102>impossible,<s%> but with <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1415>possible.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> we have <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3956>everything<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> You; <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> will there be for us?"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that you who have <S%G190>followed<s%> Me, in the <S%G3824>regeneration<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> will <S%G2523>sit<s%> on His <S%G1391>glorious<s%> <S%G2362>throne,<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> shall <S%G2521>sit<s%> upon <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2362>thrones,<s%> <S%G2919>judging<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5443>tribes<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

"And <S%G3956>everyone<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> has <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3614>houses<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G79>sisters<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G68>farms<s%> for My name's <S%G1752>sake,<s%> shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G4179>many<s%> <S%G4179>times<s%> as <S%G4179>much,<s%> and shall <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>
"But <S%G4183>many<s%> [who are] <S%G4413>first<s%> will be <S%G2078>last;<s%> and [the] <S%G2078>last,<s%> <S%G4413>first.<s%>
